Definition at line 278 of file ral_pid.c.

double VelInfoErrCal ( void *  tempptr  ) 

Error calculation function of Velocity Mode.

Difference between the current velocity and the target velocity. Current velocity is approximated by the difference between the last count and current count.

Parameters:
tempptr Pointer to Velocity Mode information
Returns:
Error term
